```{r latex_functions, echo=FALSE}
print_as_latex <- function(r_equation){
  # Hides asterisks that are present in any R equations passed to this func
  r_equation <- gsub("\\*", "", r_equation)
  cat(paste("$$",r_equation,"$$"))
}
```
